resources.string:
You are the magenta orb. 

The yellow node highlights the next path your orb will take. You can toggle this path to other connected nodes with a short tap. 

Rotate the view with left/right movement and speed/slow your orb with up/down movement. 

Pause your orb with a long press, and restart it with a fling. 

Move in or out with a 2-finger scale gesture. 

Practice these a few times to get to the next level.

Collect the blue orbs and avaoid the red orbs. 

You can toggle between an observation and follow mode using the top right button. 

Slow and steady to plan a route and speed for a getaway!
